trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event is raised by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class.
<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.EventArgs> and is passed to handlers for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> deriva <xref:System.EventArgs> e são passados para manipuladores para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A shared speech recognizer's state cannot be changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Estado do reconhecedor de fala compartilhado não pode ser alterado por meio de programação.

trans-unit.source: Users can change a shared speech recognizer's state using the Speech Recognition user interface (UI) or through the **Speech Recognition** member of the Windows **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Os usuários podem alterar o estado do reconhecedor de fala compartilhada usando a interface de usuário de reconhecimento de fala (UI) ou por meio de **o reconhecimento de fala** membro do Windows **painel de controle**.

trans-unit.source: Both the **On** and **Sleep** settings in the Speech Recognition UI correspond to the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: Ambos o **na** e **suspensão** configurações na interface de usuário de reconhecimento de fala correspondem ao `Listening` estado.

trans-unit.source: The **Off** setting in the Speech Recognition UI corresponds to <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Stopped>.
trans-unit.target: O **Off** configuração na interface de usuário de reconhecimento de fala corresponde à <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState.Stopped>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a shared speech recognizer, and then creates two types of grammars for recognizing specific words and for accepting free dictation.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um reconhecedor de fala compartilhado e, em seguida, cria dois tipos de gramáticas para reconhecer palavras específicas e aceitando ditado livre.

trans-unit.source: The example asynchronously loads all the created grammars to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo carrega assincronamente todas as gramáticas criadas para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method to put Windows Recognition in "listening" mode.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> evento usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> método para colocar o reconhecimento do Windows no modo "escutando".

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the shared speech recognition engine in Windows.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala compartilhado no Windows.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState" /> instance that indicates whether the state of a shared speech recognition engine is <see langword="Listening" /> or <see langword="Stopped" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState" /> instância que indica se o estado de um mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala compartilhado é <see langword="Listening" /> ou <see langword="Stopped" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example updates a display based on the state information provided by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> instance that is obtained from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> instance passed to a handler for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir atualiza uma exibição com base nas informações de estado fornecidas por um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> instância que é obtida o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> instância passada para um manipulador para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> eventos.
